NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}."}],"AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount(address,bytes32)":[{"details":"The `account` is missing a role."}],"Create2EmptyBytecode()":[{"details":"There's no code to deploy."}],"FailedDeployment()":[{"details":"The deployment failed."}],"InsufficientBalance(uint256,uint256)":[{"details":"The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"events":{"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted signaling this."},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call. This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"collectFeesFromCampaigns(address[])":{"details":"Only callable by NUDGE_OPERATOR_ROLE","params":{"campaigns":"Array of campaign addresses to collect fees from"}},"constructor":{"details":"All parameters must be non-zero addresses","params":{"admin_":"Address to be granted NUDGE_ADMIN_ROLE","operator_":"Address to be granted NUDGE_OPERATOR_ROLE","swapCaller_":"Address to be granted SWAP_CALLER_ROLE","treasury_":"Address of the treasury to collect fees"}},"deployAndFundCampaign(uint32,address,address,uint256,address,uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"If rewardToken is NATIVE_TOKEN, msg.value must be at least administrator","holdingPeriodInSeconds":"Duration users must hold tokens to be eligible for rewards","initialRewardAmount":"Amount of reward tokens to fund the campaign with","rewardPPQ":"The reward multiplier for calculating rewards","rewardToken":"Address of the token used for rewards","startTimestamp":"When the campaign starts","targetToken":"Address of the token users need to hold","uuid":"Unique identifier for the campaign"},"returns":{"campaign":"Address of the deployed and funded campaign contract"}},"deployCampaign(uint32,address,address,uint256,address,uint256,address,uint256)":{"details":"Uses Create2 for deterministic address generation","params":{"alternativeWithdrawalAddress":"Optional address for alternative reward withdrawal","campaignAdmin":"Address of the campaign admin","holdingPeriodInSeconds":"Duration users must hold tokens to be eligible for rewards","rewardPPQ":"The reward factor in parts per quadrillion for calculating rewards","rewardToken":"Address of the token used for rewards","startTimestamp":"When the campaign starts","targetToken":"Address of the token users need to hold","uuid":"Unique identifier for the campaign"},"returns":{"campaign":"Address of the deployed campaign contract"}},"getCampaignAddress(uint32,address,address,uint256,address,uint256,uint16,address,uint256)":{"details":"Uses the same parameters as deployCampaign to compute the Create2 address","params":{"alternativeWithdrawalAddress":"Optional address for alternative reward withdrawal","campaignAdmin":"Address of the campaign administrator","feeBps":"Nudge's fee percentage in basis points","holdingPeriodInSeconds":"Duration users must hold tokens to be eligible for rewards","rewardPPQ":"The reward multiplier for calculating rewards","rewardToken":"Address of the token used for rewards","startTimestamp":"When the campaign starts","targetToken":"Address of the token users need to hold","uuid":"Unique identifier for the campaign"},"returns":{"computedAddress":"The address where the campaign would be deployed"}},"getCampaignCount()":{"returns":{"_0":"The count of all campaigns deployed by this factory"}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"pauseCampaigns(address[])":{"details":"Only callable by NUDGE_ADMIN_ROLE","params":{"campaigns":"Array of campaign addresses to pause"}},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. params.campaigns: Array of campaign addresses to collect fees from

constructor.details: All parameters must be non-zero addresses

params.treasury_: Address of the treasury to collect fees

deployAndFundCampaign(uint32,address,add.details: If rewardToken is NATIVE_TOKEN, msg.value must be at least initialRewardAmount

params.alternativeWithdrawalAddress: Optional address for alternative reward withdrawal
params.holdingPeriodInSeconds: Duration users must hold tokens to be eligible for rewards
params.initialRewardAmount: Amount of reward tokens to fund the campaign with
params.rewardPPQ: The reward multiplier for calculating rewards
params.rewardToken: Address of the token used for rewards
params.targetToken: Address of the token users need to hold

returns.campaign: Address of the deployed and funded campaign contract

deployCampaign(uint32,address,address,ui.details: Uses Create2 for deterministic address generation

params.alternativeWithdrawalAddress: Optional address for alternative reward withdrawal
params.holdingPeriodInSeconds: Duration users must hold tokens to be eligible for rewards
params.rewardPPQ: The reward factor in parts per quadrillion for calculating rewards
params.rewardToken: Address of the token used for rewards
params.targetToken: Address of the token users need to hold

returns.campaign: Address of the deployed campaign contract

getCampaignAddress(uint32,address,addres.details: Uses the same parameters as deployCampaign to compute the Create2 address

params.alternativeWithdrawalAddress: Optional address for alternative reward withdrawal
params.feeBps: Nudge's fee percentage in basis points
params.holdingPeriodInSeconds: Duration users must hold tokens to be eligible for rewards
params.rewardPPQ: The reward multiplier for calculating rewards
params.rewardToken: Address of the token used for rewards
params.targetToken: Address of the token users need to hold

returns.computedAddress: The address where the campaign would be deployed

returns._0: The count of all campaigns deployed by this factory

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

params.campaigns: Array of campaign addresses to pause

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

params.campaigns: Array of campaign addresses to unpause

collectFeesFromCampaigns(address[]).notice: Collects accumulated fees from multiple campaigns

constructor.notice: Initializes the contract with required addresses and roles

deployAndFundCampaign(uint32,address,add.notice: Deploys a new campaign and funds it with initial rewards

getCampaignAddress(uint32,address,addres.notice: Computes the deterministic address of a campaign based on its parameters

getCampaignCount().notice: Returns the total number of deployed campaigns

updateFeeSetting(uint16).notice: Update Nudge's fee in basis points for future campaigns created by this factory

documentation.text:
@notice Returns the total number of deployed campaigns
 @return The count of all campaigns deployed by this factory
